text:
This is a placeholder random basic weakness.

You can replace it with a specific weakness manually or use the randomize button to replace it with a random weakness from your collection.

deck_options.name: Versatile
deck_options.error: Too many off-class cards for Versatile.
Deck must have at least 10 skill cards.
You cannot have assets that take up an ally slot.

back_flavor: Lola had assumed that her days of performing The King in Yellow were behind her. Recently, however, she has heard a lone violin play the haunting melody from the show's last production. The music creeps into her mind in moments of silence and solitude, and she's compelled to visit the Ward Theatre one last time.
back_text: Deck size: 40. Class Choices: At deck creation, choose 2 classes ([guardian], [seeker], [rogue], [mystic], or [survivor]). Deckbuilding Options: Neutral cards level 0-5, cards from your chosen classes level 0-4, cards from other classes level 0-1. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 2 copies of Improvisation, 2 copies of Crisis of Identity, 1 random basic weakness. Additional Requirements: Your deck must include at least 6 cards from each class ([guardian], [seeker], [rogue], [mystic], and [survivor]).

deck_options.error: You must have at least 6 cards from each faction.

name: Lola Hayes
text: You begin the game in the Neutral role. You can only play or commit Neutral cards or cards of your current role. Forced - When your turn begins: Switch your role ([guardian], [seeker], [rogue], [mystic], [survivor], or Neutral). [elder_sign] effect: +2. You may switch roles.

flavor: "I'm done waiting in the wings."
name: Leading Lady (Heroine)
text: Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Play a card from your hand, regardless of your current role (paying its cost). If that card was a Guardian ([guardian]) card, you may either draw 1 card or immediately take a fight action.

flavor: "I've learned a thing or two on stage."
name: Leading Lady (Mentor)
text: Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Play a card from your hand, regardless of your current role (paying its cost). If that card was a Seeker ([seeker]) card, you may either draw 1 card or immediately take an investigate action.

flavor: "Trust me, honey, I'm lead material."
name: Leading Lady (Femme Fatale)
text: Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Play a card from your hand, regardless of your current role (paying its cost). If that card was a Rogue ([rogue]) card, you may either draw 1 card or immediately take an evade action.

flavor: "The trick is to only show them what you want them to see."
name: Leading Lady (Enchantress)
text: Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Play a card from your hand, regardless of your current role (paying its cost). If that card was a Mystic ([mystic]) card, you may either draw 1 card or remove 1 doom from a player card at your location.

flavor: "Come on, Lola, just make it to the final bow."
name: Leading Lady (Final Girl)
text: Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Fast. Play only during your turn. Play a card from your hand, regardless of your current role (paying its cost). If that card was a Survivor ([survivor]) card, you may either draw 1 card or heal 1 damage/horror.

name: Samuel Blake
text:
Lola Hayes deck only. Replacement. Peril. Hidden.
While Samuel Blake is in your hand, you cannot switch roles or play cards belonging to another role.
While Samuel Blake is in play, as an additional cost for you to switch your role, you must take 1 horror.

back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 1 more than the number of measures.
[cultist]: -3. If you fail, you must spend 1 clue and take 1 damage.
[tablet]: -4 (-6 instead if there are 3 or more classes among cards you control).
[elder_thing]: -3. If Sinister Soloist is at your location, you automatically fail instead.
name: Enthralling Encore
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of measures.
[cultist]: -2. If you fail, you must either spend 1 clue or take 1 damage.
[tablet]: -3 (-5 instead if there are 3 or more classes among cards you control).
[elder_thing]: -2. If Sinister Soloist is at your location, reveal another token.

back_flavor: The soloist haunts your steps, ever present and always playing that maddening song. You feel the musical notes take root in your mind, threatening to pull you out of the theatre and into another world, one you think you've visited before...
back_text:
Place 1 resource on the scenario reference card, as a measure. Then if there are 5 or more measures, each investigator is defeated and suffers 1 mental trauma.
Otherwise, each investigator must test [willpower](3). Each investigator who fails takes 1 horror and sets aside 1 non-permanent, non-weakness asset they control. Then, shuffle each asset set aside by this effect into the Props deck. If all investigators fail this test, remove 1[per_investigator] damage from Sinister Soloist.
Place clues on each revealed location, up to its clue value.
Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Reset this agenda to agenda 1a.
flavor: The theatre is closed and quiet, as it has been since those days during the phantom production of The King in Yellow. As you take in your surroundings, you hear it again - the haunting violin. Someone is here, and they are keeping the memory of that production alive.
name: The Haunting of the Ward Theatre
text: [fast] While at Sinister Soloist's location, discard 1 card of each class from your hand ([guardian], [seeker], [rogue], [mystic], and [survivor]): Parley. Automatically evade Sinister Soloist. Treat Sinister Soloist's text box as if it were blank (except for [[Traits]]) for the remainder of the round.

back_flavor: The soloist crumples before you, collapsing to the floor in a puff of acrid, black smoke and glowing embers, reeking of rosin. Your skin burns and your eyes water, forcing you to turn away. Coughing and waving your arms to clear the air, the smoke eventually dissipates. The soloist is nowhere to be seen. The theatre is quiet once again, as is your mind. Whatever unresolved business this stage held seems to be finished now. You turn and head back to the lobby, ready to put the Ward Theatre behind you for good.
flavor: The soloist stands on stage, their gangly arms moving with mechanical precision as they play the violin. Their face is shrouded in shadow, but their song follows you throughout the theatre.
name: Break Free from the Past
text: [fast] Investigators at the same [[Private]] location spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Parley. Reveal the top 3 cards of the Props deck and choose an investigator to draw 1 of them. Shuffle the remaining cards together and place them on the bottom of the Props deck. Objective - When Sinister Soloist is in the victory display, advance.

name: Sinister Soloist
text: Alert. Aloof. Elusive. Hunter. As an additional cost to play a non-Neutral card at Sinister Soloist's location, you must take 1 horror. Forced - When the enemy phase ends, if Sinister Soloist is ready: Each investigator at Sinister Soloist's location and each connecting location takes 1 direct horror.

back_flavor: Joe Diamond has more experience with supernatural nonsense than most. He has developed a keen intuition and a knack for getting to the bottom of even the most uncanny occurrences, helped in no small part by his willingness to get his hands dirty. But in recent weeks, even Joe has been hard-pressed to stay on top of his work. His desk is flooded with photos of grisly murders and reports of disappearances: people from all walks of life vanishing without a trace. Joe isn't sure how each of these events is connected, but he's not about to let the case go cold.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-2, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Detective's Intuition, Dead Ends, 1 random basic weakness.
flavor: "I can't stop now. Not when I'm so close to the truth."
name: Joe Diamond
text:
[reaction] After you successfully investigate: Draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. If you succeed, draw 1 card and gain 1 resource.

flavor: "I don't know how you do it, Mr. Diamond. Your insight never ceases to impress."
name: Detective's Intuition
text:
Joe Diamond deck only.
Gain 2 resources and heal 1 damage or 1 horror.
[reaction] After you draw Detective's Intuition during your turn: Reveal it and draw 2 additional cards.

name: Dead Ends
text: Forced - When you search your deck and Dead Ends is among the searched cards: Draw it, cancel the effects of the search, and shuffle your deck. Forced - When the game ends or you are eliminated, if this card is in your hand: You earn 2 fewer experience.

flavor: "I'm not here to help you shop; I'm here to keep you alive."
name: Bodyguard
text:
Bodyguard may be assigned damage dealt to other investigators at your location.
[reaction] When Bodyguard is defeated: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

flavor: Nothing's gonna keep you down.
name: Resilience

flavor: "I've taken every class that Dr. Christopher offers!"
name: Dorothy Simmons
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you successfully investigate by exactly 1 or 3, exhaust Dorothy Simmons: Gain 1 resource.

name: Fingerprint Kit
text: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Exhaust Fingerprint Kit and spend 1 supply: Investigate ([intellect]). You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at your location.

flavor: "They're just in it for the extra credit."
name: Laboratory Assistant
text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
[reaction] After you play Laboratory Assistant: Draw 2 cards.

flavor: "I could swear we've been here before..."
name: Local Map
text: Uses (4 secrets). [action] Spend 1 secret: Investigate ([intellect]). Investigate a revealed connecting location. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation. If you succeed, you may exhaust Local Map to move to that location.

flavor: A lens into a world unseen can reveal things you wish it hadn't.
name: Magnifying Glass
text:
Fast.
You get +1 [intellect] while investigating.

name: Sharp Rhetoric
text:
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test (+2 [intellect] instead if this is an investigation or parley).
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test (+2 [willpower] instead if this is an investigation or parley).

flavor: You learn so much more by getting up-close and personal.
name: Gather Intel
text:
Fast. Play when an enemy enters your location.
Draw 2 cards.

name: Through the Cracks
text: Evade ([agility]). You get +1 [agility] for this evasion for each clue you control (to a maximum of +3). If you succeed, you may disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to a revealed connecting location.

name: Working a Hunch
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Discover 1 clue at your location.

flavor: A smaller piece of an even greater mystery.
name: Deduction
text: If this skill test is successful while investigating a location, discover 1 additional clue at that location.

name: Mysterious Grimoire
text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[fast] During your turn, spend 1 or 2 secrets and exhaust Mysterious Grimoire: Search the top 3 cards (or 6 cards instead if you spent 2 secrets) of your deck for a card and draw it. If 1 or more weaknesses are among the searched cards, draw them as well. Shuffle your deck.

name: Through the Cracks
text: Evade ([agility]). You get +2 [agility] for this evasion for each clue you control (to a maximum of +6). If you succeed, you may disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to a revealed connecting location.

flavor: "We spent the rest of the night in the brilliantly lighted study, nervously discussing what we should do next." - H.P. Lovecraft, "The Rats in the Walls"
name: Studious
text:
Permanent.
You begin each game with 1 additional card in your opening hand.

name: Unbridled Knowledge
text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck (8 cards instead if you control 2 or more clues). Draw 3 of them and place the rest of those cards on the top and/or bottom of your deck in any order.

name: M1903 Hammerless
text: Uses (4 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight ([agility]). If the targeted enemy is exhausted, this attack deals +1 damage.

flavor: "I suppose I'll help you... for now."
name: Olivier Bishop
text:
You get +1 [agility].
[fast] During your turn, exhaust Olivier Bishop: Move to a connecting location.

flavor: "To be createde of 3 partes aether, 2 cinnabar, and at least 3 pounds ophe rokket gatherede from ain hevenful mountain." -Alchemical Formula No VIII ca. 1660
name: Cloak of Resonance
text: [reaction] When horror is placed on Cloak of Resonance, exhaust it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Cosmic Flame
text: Uses (3 charges). [action]: Fight ([willpower]). If you succeed, you may spend 1 charge to deal +1 damage for this attack. If you reveal a [skull] token during this test, remove 1 charge from Cosmic Flame (if you cannot, take 1 damage and discard this card).

name: Ward of Protection
text:
Fast. Play when you draw a non-weakness treachery card.
Cancel that card's revelation effect and take 1 horror.

flavor: "I've had way worse, pal."
name: Aleksey Saburov
text: [reaction] When your turn begins: Heal 1 damage or 1 horror from Aleksey Saburov.

name: Hunter's Instinct
text:
Limit 1 per investigator. Uses (3 supplies). If there are no supplies on Hunter's Instinct, discard it.
[reaction] After you engage an enemy, spend 1 supply and exhaust Hunter's Instinct: Add a level 0 event in your discard pile to your hand.

flavor: You keep finding things you thought you'd lost in those deep pockets.
name: Jumpsuit
text: [fast] During your turn, discard Jumpsuit: Choose a [[Tool]] or [[Weapon]] asset in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

name: Levelheaded
text:
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test (+2 [willpower] instead if this test is on a scenario card).
[fast] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [agility] for this skill test (+2 [agility] instead if this test is on a scenario card).

name: Meat Cleaver
text: [action]: Fight ([combat]). You get +1 [combat] for this attack (+2 [combat] instead if you have 3 or fewer remaining sanity). If this attack defeats an enemy, you may heal 1 horror. [reaction] When you trigger the above [action] ability, take 1 horror: This attack deals +1 damage.

name: "Shove off!"
text: Evade ([agility]). If you succeed, deal 1 damage to the evaded enemy. If you fail, return "Shove off!" to your hand at the end of your turn.

name: Slippery
text: If this skill test is successful while evading a non-[[Elite]] enemy, that enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: Timely Intervention
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
You may commit Timely Intervention from your hand after revealing chaos tokens during a skill test you are performing.

name: Old Compass
text: [action]: Investigate ([intellect]). Your location gets -1 shroud for this investigation. If you fail, you may exhaust Old Compass to attempt this test again. If you do, your location gets -2 shroud for this investigation, instead.

name: Meat Cleaver
text: [action]: Fight ([combat]). You get +2 [combat] for this attack (+3 [combat] instead if you have 3 or fewer remaining sanity). If this attack defeats an enemy, you may heal 1 horror. [reaction] When you trigger the above [action] ability, take 1 horror: This attack deals +1 damage.

flavor:
Works in any situation, and the batteries never run out!
- Schoffner's Catalogue, Spring 1927 ed.
name: Hand-Crank Flashlight
text: [action]: Investigate ([intellect]). You get +1 [intellect] for this test. If you succeed, you may discard Hand-Crank Flashlight for your location to get -1 shroud until the end of the round.

flavor: You can never be too prepared.
name: Emergency Cache
text: Gain 3 resources.

flavor: At last, I've found it!
name: Perception
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, the performing investigator draws 1 card.

name: The Gold Bug
text: Revelation - Put The Gold Bug into play in your threat area. It cannot leave play except by the [action] ability below. You get -1 health and -1 sanity. [action]: Shuffle the Gold Bug into your deck.

name: The Nameless Lurker
text: Aloof. Spawn - Farthest empty location. Forced - When the investigation phase ends, if The Nameless Lurker is ready and has no doom on it: Place 1 doom on it.
